title: Projects
subtitle: Manage your development projects
noProjectsMessage: Create your first project to start organizing your work.
organizationRequiredMessage: You need to belong to an organization to manage projects.

createProjectForm.statusInfo: New projects automatically start with "Planning" status. You can change this after creation.
createProjectForm.teamMembersPlaceholder: Enter team member IDs separated by commas (e.g., 60a1e2c7b9b5a50d944b1e35, 60a1e2c7b9b5a50d944b1e36)
createProjectForm.teamMembersHelp: Leave empty to create project without team members
createProjectForm.organizationRequiredError: You need to belong to an organization to create projects.
createProjectForm.contactAdminMessage: Please contact your administrator to be added to an organization.

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 3 characters
validation.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
